onlineWarning: Registration to online festival will be open later.
liveClosed: Registration to live festival is closed, everything is sold out. See you next year!
onlineClosed: Registration to online festival is closed, everything is sold out. See you next year!
allClosed: Registration to this edition of the festival is closed, everything is sold out. See you next year!

common.numbersError: This field is for numbers only

workshops.title: Workshops
workshops.selectTitle: Full Pass or one by one?
workshops.fullPassDescription1: It’s possible to buy workshops as a package — Full Pass or single workshops of your choice.
workshops.fullPassDescription2: Full Pass unlocks all the workshops, discounts in competition and access to World Show. Also allows you to pay in installments (except Promo tariff). Kids and Baby have 50% discount.
workshops.fullPassDescriptionSoldOut: Full Pass for this edition of our festival has been sold out. It is only possible to buy single workshops.

discounts.title: Full Pass / group discounts
discounts.groupDescription: 20% discount on Full Pass for registration of 3+ participants as a group. Discount won't be summarized with personal discounts or discounts for kids.
discounts.details: How did you acquire your certificate?
discounts.detailsDescription: Please state where and when did you acquire your discount certificate. As all the certificates are personal, we will check your right to use it with the organizers of an event where you won it.

contest.checkboxLabel: I want to take part in solo competition
contest.soloPassLabel: I want to buy Solo Pass
contest.solosPassDescription: With the Solo Pass you can dance unlimited times in all solo categories, except live tabla solo. You save, if you dance more than 3 times.
contest.oops: In order to take part in the competition all the participants are required to have at least one workshop or Full pass for Baby and Kids, 3 workshops or Full Pass for Juniors and older.

groups.title: Competition duos and groups
groups.checkboxLabel: I want to register a duo or a group
groups.name: Group / duo name
groups.qtyError: Number of dancers in a group can not be less than 3

worldShow.title: World show
worldShow.description: You have a unique opportunity to perform on the main festival’s stage during the World Show, which will take place on the last day of the festival.
worldShow.oops: In order to take part in the World Show all the participants are required to have at least one workshop or Full pass for Baby and Kids, 3 workshops or Full Pass for Juniors and older.
worldShow.group: I want to add duo or group
worldShow.qtyError: Number of dancers in a group can not be less than 2

summary.title: Summary
summary.rulesCheckbox: I have read and accept festival's <0>prices and conditions</0> as well as <1>competition rules</1>

money.title: Finances
money.installments: I want to pay with 2 installments
money.installmentsDetails: There is a possibility to pay for your package in 2 installments. The first 50% should be paid right after the registration, the other 50% any time before 31.07.2023. In case if the second payment is failed to be transferred in due time, you will be fined the amount of 100€, which must be paid with the second part before the festival begins.

form.error: Oops. Something went wrong. Please try again later or contact us to resolve the issue.

email.title: We received your registration!
email.intro: Thank you for your registration to Dance Weekend in Warsaw! We will contact you with payment confirmation and additional info as soon as we process your payment.
email.orderTitle: Here is what you sent us
email.paymentNote1: For your registration to be accepted you need to make a payment on
email.photoNote1: If you wish to receive a personal participant's poster, please send us your photo at
email.userSubj: Welcome to Dance Weekend in Warsaw!
email.telegram1: Join our telegram group for participants to follow all the festival news and announcements by following
